archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer who has multiple prods/services with Vodafone, I want the be able to control how my products/services are grouped together across my invoices and within the various customer portals e.g. Mobile vs Fixed groups or Auck, Wn, Chch sites grouped separately, or certain Mobiles to Cost Centre A, and the other mobiles to Cost Centre B. Note - This is currently achieved by using a Parent/Child account structure
